item.title: Tayyaba Zainab - Efficient AI Engineer
item.description:
Introduction

I’m an AI researcher with ~4 years of experience in developing and deploying machine learning models optimized for resource-constrained hardware. My expertise lies in hardware-aware optimization, model compression, and systems-level design, balancing accuracy, latency, and memory on embedded platforms.

Contact

  • 📞 +49 1577 2112264
  • 📧 tayyaba.zainab0807@gmail.com
  • 🐙 TayyabaZainab0807
  • 📍 Herzog-Friedrich Str. 52, 24103 Kiel

Work Experience

Doctorate Researcher in Computer Science

GEOMAR, Kiel — 2022–Present
Automated event detection and time-series forecasting with ML in embedded systems. Published in IEEE/ACM IoTDI, ACM/SIGAPP, IEEE DCOSS.
